Posts.Content: Nov 12, 2015 09:56PM Matty_35 wrote: so I went to the doctor yesterday. He said that I had a cyst in the area where the indent is. The ultrasound said that the cyst was clearly defined and fluid filled. The doctor told me that this was likely the cause for the indent. I told him that I couldnt accept this and he referred me to a major hospital for a rapid assessment. Apparently I will have further testing and results the following day. Will keep u posted.

Posts.Content: Nov 9, 2015 04:51PM Matty_35 wrote: hello. I'm in the same situation as you. I have an indentation on my right breast. My doctor could not see it but it is very obvious in natural light. I had an ultrasound last week. Going on Wednesday for results. I don't have anything to offer except to say I feel your anxiety!
Posts.Title: mammogram clear but still worried as indent on breast Busymum2015 evey40

Posts.Content: Matty_35 wrote: hello everyone. This is my first post although I've been lurking for a while. My name is Matty and I am a 35 year old mother of three. Back in august of this year I felt a painful lump in my lower right breast. I went for an ultrasound and a small cyst was discovered. My doctor told me no follow up needed. I became worried again two weeks ago when I noticed a small indentation in the same area. I went to my doctor who did a physical exam and could not see the dent. I think it was the light in his office because it is clearly there. Anyways he sent me for an ultrasound none the less. I am going back to see him on Wednesday but I wanted to know what you ladies think of this. Can the cyst cause the dent or is this something more? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Breast indentation Matty_35 Busymum2015

Posts.Content: Nov 9, 2015 01:59PM Matty_35 wrote: thanks for your reply. As you know this waiting and wondering if so hard. I find myself thinking 'what if' time and time again and I get weepy. I have not told anyone about this as it's hard for me to be strong when people around me are worried. I just don't know what to push for. My doc said they won't do mammogram on me because of my age. If the second ultrasound shows a cyst in the area of the dent do i just accept that it is the cause of everything? Im so confused :(.
Posts.Title: Breast indentation Matty_35 Busymum2015
